Class PageToPdfConverter

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PageToPdfConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    PAGE to PDF Converter using iText library http://itextpdf.com/
    Author:
    clc

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageToPdfConverter

        public PageToPdfConverter(org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.shared.ContentType textLevel,
                  boolean addRegionOutlines,
                  boolean addTextLineOutlines,
                  boolean addWordOutlines,
                  boolean addGlyphOutlines)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        textLevel - Page content level from which to get the text (regions, text lines, words, or glyphs). Use RegionType.TextRegion for regions (blocks/zones), LowLevelTextType.... otherwise.
        addRegionOutlines - Add graphical overlay with polygonal region (zone) outlines
        addTextLineOutlines - Add graphical overlay with polygonal text line outlines
        addWordOutlines - Add graphical overlay with polygonal word outlines
        addGlyphOutlines - Add graphical overlay with polygonal glyph (character) outlines
